dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3843 RH: Action for Dental Health Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Kelly of Illinois (for herself and Mr. Simpson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

Additional sponsors: Ms. Sewell, Mr. Van Drew, Ms. Blunt Rochester, Mr. Babin, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Quigley, Mr. Rouzer, Mr. Ferguson, Ms. McCollum, Ms. Brownley, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Pocan, and Ms. Tlaib
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants to address dental workforce needs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Action for Dental Health Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of grants to address dental workforce needs
section.text: Section 340G(f) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 256g(f)) is amended by striking 2019 through 2023 and inserting 2024 through 2028.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
